Uses of Interface
Components.Concrete.Parser.IParserComp

  • Packages that use IParserComp 
    Package Description
    Components.Abstract.Abstraction
    Provides classes and an interface implementing Abstractor component.
    Components.Concrete.Parser
    Contains classes, interfaces and hierarchies of packages used to implement Parser components (interpreting, source-code generated and table-driven).
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser
    A base class and two packages used to implement Deterministic and Limited backtracker Parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic  
    Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.LimitedBackTracker  
    Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser
    Provides a base class for source-code generated parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a source-code generated DeterministicParser component and its source-code view.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser
    Provides a base class for all LR parser components.
    Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser
    Provides classes and interface for implementing SLRParser component.
    Components.Concrete.ParseTree
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a ParseTree component.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser

      Subinterfaces of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IParserCompExt
      An extension of IParserComp interface with tree building and lookahead services.
      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser that implement IParserComp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for both interpreting parser and table-driven parser components.
      class  CParserCompExt
      This class extends abstract base class CParserComp with tree building services.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser

      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser that implement IParserComp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CInterpretingParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for interpreting parser components.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic

      Subinterfaces of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IDeterministicParserComp
      Defines services for interacting with other components ( like, Grammar, SymbolStream and Parser components).
      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.Deterministic that implement IParserComp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CDeterministicParserComp
      A component holding an interpreting deterministic parser object.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.InterpretingParser.LimitedBackTracker

      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser that implement IParserComp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSourceCodeGeneratedParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for Source-code generated parser components.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic

      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser.SourceCodeGeneratedParser.Deterministic that implement IParserComp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSourceCodeDeterministicParserComp
      A component generating the source-code of a recursive-descent parser from a given grammar.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CLRParserComp
      This is intended to be an abstract base class for LR parser components.

    • Uses of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser

      Subinterfaces of IParserComp in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ISLRParserComp
      Provides services for collaborating with other components, like Grammar, SymbolStream, Treebuilder and SLRParseTable.
      Classes in Components.Concrete.Parser.TableDrivenParser.SLRParser that implement IParserComp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSLRParserComp
      A component holding a SLR parser object.
